label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_022
content:
## 2026-01-24 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /dns-query: REQUESTS req | p50: 15ms p95: 35ms p99: 50ms | err: 0.07% (17 errors) | success: 99.93%
- /zone-transfer: REQUESTS req | p50: 600ms p95: 1400ms p99: 2000ms | err: 3.0% (1 transfer failure) | success: 97.0%
- /dnssec-sign: REQUESTS req | p50: 20ms p95: 45ms p99: 60ms | err: 0.0% | success: 100%
- /health-check: REQUESTS req | p50: 10ms p95: 25ms p99: 40ms | err: 0.02% (5 errors) | success: 99.98%
- /cache-purge: REQUESTS req | p50: 12ms p95: 30ms p99: 45ms | err: 0.0% | success: 100%
- /config-update: REQUESTS req | p50: 22ms p95: 50ms p99: 70ms | err: 0.0% | success: 100%
- /metrics: REQUESTS req | p50: 8ms p95: 20ms p99: 35ms | err: 0.0% | success: 100%
- /status: REQUESTS req | p50: 5ms p95: 15ms p99: 25ms | err: 0.0% | success: 100%

### Infrastructure
- bind-master-01: CPU 32% | Mem 63% | Disk 79% | Conns: 1278 | Net: 86/116 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 24% | Mem 50% | Disk 58% | Conns: 1062 | Net: 62/78 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 52% | Mem 70% | Disk 55% | Conns: N/A | Net: 108/148 Mbps
- signer-01: CPU 36% | Mem 74% | Disk 65% | Conns: N/A | Net: 17/22 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-dns-queries: active 150 | idle 20 | waiting 5 | exhaustion 0 | max 200 | avg_wait 10ms
- pool-zone-transfers: active 10 | idle 2 | waiting 1 | exhaustion 0 | max 15 | avg_wait 15ms
- pool-auth-servers: active 8 | idle 2 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 10 | avg_wait 5ms
- pool-cache-lookup: active 25 | idle 5 | waiting 2 | exhaustion 0 | max 30 | avg_wait 8ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 88% | Bandwidth: 2.5 Gbps | Origin requests: 12,000

### Alerts
- [WARNING] propagation p95 increase after maintenance on cloud-dns-sync-01: 175s
- [INFO] SOA serial mismatch on zone example.com: 1 mismatch detected
- [ERROR] bogus validation events in DNSSEC on zone xyz.net: 2 events
- [NOTICE] zonefile lint errors detected: 5 issues

### Deployments & Changes
- Applied 4 change requests successfully; mean time to apply 22 minutes
- Onboarded new zones; corrected SPF TXT formatting and missing NS records
- Performed quarterly allow-update policy review; tightened ACLs for 3 zones
- Manual IXFR triggered for zone with SOA mismatch; validated serial parity

### Events
- Noted slight propagation p95 increase after provider maintenance; monitored and confirmed no sustained impact beyond 2 hours
- One SOA serial mismatch on a rarely updated zone; resolved by triggering manual IXFR and validating serial parity
- Lint found 5 issues on newly onboarded zonefiles from acquisition; corrected inconsistent SPF TXT formatting and missing NS for delegated subzone
- Performed quarterly review of allow-update policies; tightened dynamic update ACLs for 3 zones

### On-Call
- Shift: Y. Tanaka. 1 pages. 7 tickets. Status: Stable; minor mismatch resolved and acquisition zonefile cleanup underway
